website_summaries.verdict: A full size, 18" classic American Girl doll with a fun story set in 1970s San Francisco.
pros: Long, straight hair is great for styling
Julie's story is fun and has other books in the series that can be bought separately
cons: Not as pricey as the newer dolls, but still an investment

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Bought because daughter was going to an American Girl party and she didnt have an AG doll of her own. She was very surprised and fell in love with this Julie doll. Doll is cute, as well as her outfit. My 6 year old likes to do her hair. My daughter has zero complaints. She also does not play with it too much, unless shes doing her hair. This being the first American Girl doll that I have ever purchased...I will not buy again. It is WAY over priced. You can buy a My Life doll for so much cheaper and there is no difference except the ridiculous price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Mrslurv

customer_reviews.title: my great granddaughters. Thank yous were sparse but I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Two dolls were purchased for two very ungrateful girls....my great granddaughters. Thank yous were sparse but I can't fully blame them as their parents are shirking their duties. This also includes not teaching these girls table manners.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Doll
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I can rebuy for my granddaughter when her mom feels she is old enough. Reliable vendor. Arrived promptly. No problem with return. Lovely gift for 8 year old. .

customer_reviews.title: Love this American Girl doll!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice that Amazon offered Julie for the same price as the AG store. My daughter picked her out for a birthday gift and absolutely loves her! She's a nice addition to the collection and you can't beat the quality of AG dolls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and is a genuine American Girl product.
customer_reviews.text: I still don’t understand why these dolls are so expensive but this seller is no higher than anyone else. They’re no cheaper though either. Genuine American Girl Doll that is exactly as described. The package arrived in perfect condition so, if you’re a collector, your original American Girl Doll packaging will still be in pristine condition. I bought this as a gift for my 9 year old daughter and she is absolutely ecstatic about it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas kimbro

customer_reviews.title: Julie "Rocks"
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has played with this doll every day for the last 6 weeks since she received it as a gift. Since she is in 3rd grade, it has inspired her to read all 6 books in the American Doll Series - "Julie". She can't wait until this summer to take a vacation to San Francisco to see Julie's hometown. It is definitely case of being able to identify with not only the doll, but also with a bygone era (the 1970's), and a city.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this folk. My daughter has been asking for an American Girl doll for two years now and for her 7th birthday we decided to buy her one. Compared to journey girl dolls and the My life brands, the quality is subpar and the hair is horrible. For all the money we spent I expect high quality not dollar store quality.

product_meta.title: American Girl Julie Doll & Paperback Book
product_meta.description:
Optimistic Julie Albright has warm brown eyes that open and close and long, straight blond hair styled with a tiny braid at the side. She comes in an authentic 1970s outfit: 

 * A lemon-yellow crocheted vest
 * A tank top with a groovy peace-sign graphic
 * Bell-bottom jeans with funky floral insets on each leg
 * Platform sandals
 * Underwear


The 18" Julie doll has a huggable cloth body, and her movable head and limbs are made of smooth vinyl. Includes the paperback book The Big Break, the first novel-length volume of Julie’s classic series.
feature_bullets: Authentic American Girl 18" doll and accessories
Posable limbs, and hair that can be brushed and styled
Read all about her adventures in her paperback novel
